Articles.Content:
I was thinking it would be great to use the game as a 4x.

How cool would it be to have to plan orbits in order to intercept invaders. (even assuming nearly unlimited DV you would still need to plan well) Deciding even which planet to defend if there widely spread.

Placing farms, mines and cities on the surface.

It was all cool in my mind until I tried to think have the interface would work. And I while I think it would be cool I am not sure it is even practical. I was wondering if you guys had any ideas.

Civilization will multiple planets? Oh boy.

Galactic Civilizations II.
That isn't exactly Civ V. It's close though.

Very nice idea !

Imagine then, you could hop out of your rocket pod, switch to first view person and shoot at aliens.

You could even have a green dog with you to defeat your enemies more easily...

:D:D

Oh wait ... you were serious ?

:D:D :D:D

Reality fart...

If we do get FTL and to a lesser extent colonising other star systems, I would like a version of spore that dosen't gargle gonads wit no other species.
